channel.title: [Suggestion] Add save, load & auto-load features for journal so players can make and re-use templates
channel.description:
I'm sure most of us are familiar with setting up our journals D1/N1 with numbered lists, 'graphs', artwork the odd poetry -- what have you. If you're a frequent player of this game though, this can get a little tiresome.
So I suggest we get the ability to Save, Load Auto-load user made 'templates' for our journals that are stored client side.
* Save - Saves your current journal contents to a file on your hard drive. * Load - Load previously saved journals into your current journal in game. * Auto-load [Checkbox] - Automatically loads the template that you have selected to load each time you begin a new game. Note: Requires you to choose a template with the Load option in order for it to work.
Mockup of what it would look like using MS Paint and a screenshot. (It would look 100x better in game because the devs don't suck at drawing like me!): ![template|690x483](upload://k18raaA4TtkEDIOSBA16gol28x7.jpg)
